The App is for Life Business Policy Holders to check status of the policies, prior payment details or make a complaint to customer service section. The app can also be used by prospective customers to get quotes for the policies which they’re interested in. This document specifies the features and functionality for the app but does not include technical architecture information.Most of the features in the app will rely on API calls to Leadway’s platform using XML which Leadway will provide. Illustrations used in this document are wireframes and not the final designs.
Most of the features in the app will rely on API calls to Leadway’s platform using XML which Leadway will provide. Illustrations used in this document are wireframes and not the final designs.
Manage your Life policies on the go using Leadway LIFE. A free and secure service from Leadway Assurance Compnay
To get started you will need the following
This will be used to link your number to your account
To verify your account with Leadway, you will need to have the policy number of any existing life product you\'re subscribed to
You will need to provide the email address we have on file for any life policy you have with Leadway
For this step you will need the policy number for any life product you currently have with leadway Assurance
For your security, we need to confirm your personal information
Provides a chosen cash amount to your loved ones when you are no longer here
Provides you with a chosen cash amount if you are diagnosed with a specific sickness or injury
Provides you with a chosen cash amount if you can not return to work due to temporary or permanent injury
Enter the mobile number you'd like to link to Leadway LIFE Mobile
Enter your email address and a policy number from one of your life policies
Please enter your full name and date of birth
